parsed.internal_thinking: The board has several high-yield spots already taken. Alice secured Node 20 (Wood 11, Brick 6, Sheep 8) for 12 pips, and Bob claimed Node 42 (Wheat 9, Ore 5, Wheat 9) for 12 pips. My best available option for the first settlement is Node 12, which provides 11 pips (Brick 6, Sheep 5, Wood 3). This gives me a strong start for expansion with Wood and Brick. Since this is a 3-player snake draft, I will be placing my second settlement immediately after this round. I plan to target Node 25 (Wheat 8, Ore 3, Sheep 4) for my second settlement to ensure I have access to all five resources and a path toward the Ore port. For my first road, I'll build toward Node 13 to eventually reach the 10-pip Wheat/Wood spot at Node 14. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: I am placing my first settlement at Node 12 (11 pips: B6, S5, W3). My second settlement will be Node 25 (10 pips: Wh8, O3, S4) to secure all five resources. Alice is at 20 and Bob is at 42. I need to monitor their expansion toward the center and the Brick/Ore ports.
parsed.say_outloud: Hey Alice and Bob! Those are some great spots you've picked. Alice, that 6-8-11 is a powerhouse, and Bob, that double Wheat 9 with Ore is going to make for some fast cities! I think I'll grab some of this Wood and Brick production up north and see if I can keep pace with you two. Good luck!
